sentences.sContent: Well, I think my chihuahua just killed him...
sentences.sContent_eng: Well, I think my chihuahua just killed him...
sentences.sCn: 哦，我想我的吉娃娃刚要了它的命……

sentences.sContent: Shortly before their recent wedding they were arrested by the morality police while sitting in their car with their pet chihuahua.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shortly before their recent wedding they were arrested by the morality police while sitting in their car with their pet chihuahua.
sentences.sCn: 这对新婚夫妇在结婚前不久曾被道德警察逮捕，当时他们正和他们的吉娃娃宠物狗一起坐在车里。

trans.tranCn: 吉娃娃(一种产于墨西哥的狗)
trans.tranOther: A Chihuahua is a very small dog with short hair
